img.alt: Actors standing and sitting on a stage during a play.
Basketball players in a team huddle before game.
Six baseball players with red jerseys and grey hats.
RHS Softball players to the right of VHSL Group 1A 2018 State Champions sign.

span.p: The Richmond County School Board will hold a special meeting on Wednesday, April 29, 2020 at 3:00 p.m. in the library at Rappahannock High School, Warsaw, VA 22572 to discuss the 2020-2021 budget. Adhering to the COVID-19 guidelines for social distancing, no more than 10 people will be allowed to attend.

a.title: Click to read more about: Special Meeting Notice

span.p: If you have not yet heard, schools across Virginia are closed for the remainder of the school year.

There are many questions that we have about this action and what it means for students and families. Over the next few days, we will get more information from the VDOE about graduation, meals and the continuity of learning. A more detailed letter is attached to this post.

a.title: Click to read more about: Coronavirus Update 3-23-2020

span.p: Download a copy of the 2020-2021 proposed budget for Richmond County Public Schools.

a.title: Click to read more about: Proposed Budget for 2020-2021
